name: In Search of Oasis
description:
In Search of Oasis is a short boss rush game was created for Mini-Jam 53.

The goal is to beat both bosses, and reach the Oasis.

(There was obviously more than 2 bosses planned, but bosses are much more difficult to make than I thought 🤦‍♂️)

TUTORIAL:

  • A/D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • Left-shift to dash in the air (you will go whatever direction you were previously facing)
  • Click to attack (your attack will go towards the mouse)
